text: No person shall begin the construction of a gas plant or an electric plant without first having obtained the permission and approval of the Commission.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 43-1002.

1973 Ed., § 43-602.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 13-107 rewrote the section which formerly provided:

"No gas corporation or electrical corporation shall begin the construction of a gas plant or electric plant without first having obtained the permission and approval of the Commission."

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-107, see notes following § 34-301.

DC CODE § 34-302

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Approval of construction of gas or electric plant.
